metadata.description: Under the guidance of the legendary creative team of Marv Wolfman and George Perez, the sidekicks to the greatest heroes of the DC Universe have joined together once more as the Teen Titans, but this time, new faces join the fray. Raven! Cyborg! And more! This series includes New Teen Titans (1980-1984) + Tales of the Teen Titans (1984-1988).
metadata.name: New Teen Titans
